titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2881) to amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration for fiscal years 2008 through 2011, to improve aviation safety and capacity, to provide stable funding for the national aviation system, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2881) to amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration for fiscal years 2008 through 2011, to improve aviation safety and capacity, to provide stable funding for the national aviation system, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-335, by Mr. Welch (VT).

All points of order againist consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. In lieu of the amendment in the nature of substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure now printed in the bill, the amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in part A of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, modified by the amendment printed in part B of such report, shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Commmittee of the Whole.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 118.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 664.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 664.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 189 (Roll no. 887).

vote.text: Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 196 (Roll no. 888).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 196 (Roll no. 888).

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2881 (FAA Reauthorization Act of 2007).
